title: In your custody
creator_credit: Dennis Sawyer and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: This staff training film, shows custodial procedures to be followed when transferring prisoners from one place to another by train, plane, and car. It illustrates subterfuges that should be anticipated, and ways in which they may be avoided or foiled.
creator_credit_for_label: Dennis Sawyer and National Film Board of Canada
